EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response when new lead is submitted online (Service registration form).
EmailTemplate.name: Leads: Web-to-Lead email response (Service registration form) with Letterhead
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Organization.Name} Multi-GNSS AssistNow Service registration: thank you for registering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for registering to access u-blox' assisted GNSS service, AssistNow. You will receive an electronic token to access the service once your registration has been processed.
Kind regards u-blox
